name: MYC_MESG_TOB_QTNS
description: This table contains patient answers to tobacco use questions submitted in a history questionnaire.

columns.name: MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TOB_QUESN_ID
columns.description: The ID of the tobacco use question answered by the patient.

columns.name: TOB_QUESN_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Visit Navigator (VN) History Template Definition (LQH) record.

columns.name: TOB_QUESN_RESP_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's response to the tobacco use question.

columns.name: TOB_QUESN_PPD
columns.description: The number of packs smoked per day entered by the patient.

columns.name: TOB_QUESN_YRS
columns.description: The number of years of tobacco use entered by the patient.

columns.name: TOB_QUESN_QUIT_DT
columns.description: The date quit smoking entered by the patient.

columns.name: TOB_QUESN_CMT
columns.description: The comment entered by the patient for the tobacco use question.

columns.name: TOB_QUESN_FILED_YN
columns.description: The filed status of the tobacco use question--has the provider filed it to the patient's record.

columns.name: SMOKELESS_TOB_USE_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's response to the smokeless tobacco use question.

columns.name: SMOKELESS_QUIT_DATE
columns.description: The date quit smokeless tobacco entered by the patient.

columns.name: SMOKING_TOB_USE_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's response to the smoking tobacco use question.

columns.name: SMOKING_QUIT_DATE
columns.description: The date quit smoking entered by the patient.

columns.name: TOBACCO_READY_QT_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's response to the ready to quit question.

columns.name: SMOKING_START_DATE
columns.description: The start smoking date entered by the patient.

columns.name: CURRENT_PACKS_PER_DAY
columns.description: The number of packs currently smoked per day entered by the patient.

columns.name: CURRENT_YEARS
columns.description: The current number of years of tobacco use entered by the patient.

columns.name: HAS_CUR_CIG_PER_DAY_QUESN_YN
columns.description: Used to know if we are asking a current cigarettes per day question. Stores 1 if we are 0 if it's a current packs per day question.

columns.name: HAS_AVG_CIG_PER_DAY_QUESN_YN
columns.description: Used to know if we are asking a average cigarettes per day question. Stores 1 if we are 0 if it's a average packs per day question.
